params.summary: Click a checkbox if it is not the desired value.

syntax.C#: public static void SetCheckbox(  string xPath,  bool value )
syntax.VB: Public Shared Sub SetCheckbox (   xPath As String,  value As Boolean )
syntax.C++: public: static void SetCheckbox(  String^ xPath,   bool value )

arguments.description: The xPath to use for finding the checkbox INPUT.
True if the checkbox should be checked, false otherwise.
